name: Elaine Sleep: Rogue Adventurer
description:
This is my (unfinished) entry to LudumDare39.

"If I procedurally generate caves, I won't have to design any levels!" I said to myself. completely ignoring the fact that writing code to procedurally generate good caves might not be trivial.

Completely the opposite to my last entry, I spent too long thinking about aesthetics and not enough on finishing the game mechanics.  As such, it's impossible to actually "lose" -- when you run out of batteries or hearts, please stop playing. :)

I'm quite proud of the concept and intend to revisit it -- feedback is welcomed!

Controls:

  • WASD/Arrow Keys: Move
  • Left Click: Toggle Flashlight

Secret Controls:

  • Right Click: Skip to the Next Level
